RA1.name: Communications e.g., Telecoms (traditional backbone), Mobile Networks and Broadband

businessImpact.name: Very High
businessImpact.description: An event leading to a total loss of UK wide communications nationally for more than 1 week.

businessImpact.name: High
businessImpact.description: An incident leading to loss across the country for up to a week

businessImpact.name: Medium
businessImpact.description: Anything which causes a loss across several localities and/or region for up to 24 hours.

businessImpact.name: Low
businessImpact.description: A threat or action resulting in a loss for up to 24 hours

businessImpact.name: Very Low
businessImpact.description: An activity which causes a loss for up to 12 hours

riskAppetite.name: Eager
riskAppetite.description: Eagerness, focus  or requirement to be innovative, designed to maximise opportunity.  Approach in pursuit of very high reward but may carry very high residual risk.

riskAppetite.name: Open
riskAppetite.description: Aim to undertake activities that have a high degree of purpose  value, where the likeliness of success being a determining factor. Activity may carry a large amount of residual risk.

riskAppetite.name: Cautious
riskAppetite.description: Willingness to accept a degree of risk in order to achieve key purpose e.g.  Inherent risk is deemed controllable or acceptable to a large extent.

riskAppetite.name: Minimalist
riskAppetite.description:
Tendency to undertake activities that are considered safe in achieving objects.
Pursuit of opportunity is not a key driver where inherent risk is above low.

riskAppetite.name: Averse
riskAppetite.description: Avoidance of risk in achievement of key objectives is paramount.  Activities only considered when carrying little low or very low (rare) Residual risk.

businessImpact.name: Very High
businessImpact.description: A major event which causes a massive loss of power across the country for more than 1 week.

businessImpact.name: High
businessImpact.description:
An incident resulting in disruption from a major loss of power across a region and lasting for more than 1 week
(e.g., Storm Arwen which left thousands of homes and businesses without power for in excess of a week in November 2021]

businessImpact.name: Medium
businessImpact.description: A reasonably sized incident causing disruption and loss of power across a region for up to a week

businessImpact.name: Low
businessImpact.description: An event resulting in a disruption to supplies across several localities or region causing loss of power for up to 24 hours

businessImpact.name: Very Low
businessImpact.description: An activity resulting in a local power supply outage causing disruption for up to 12 hours

RA4.name: Transport (Note: Data based on the National Risk Assessment Impact Scale)

businessImpact.name: Very High
businessImpact.description: A major event resulting in severe disruption across the country of key transport systems / links for over a month.

businessImpact.name: High
businessImpact.description: An event causing severe country wide disruption of key transport systems / links for up to a month

businessImpact.name: Medium
businessImpact.description: A more serious activity leading to major disruption of key regional transport links / systems for up to a week

businessImpact.name: Low
businessImpact.description: An incident resulting in disruption of a number of key local transport links / systems for up to 24 hours.

businessImpact.name: Very Low
businessImpact.description: An activity which leads to minor disruption of a few local transport links /systems for up to 24 hours.

businessImpact.name: Very High
businessImpact.description:
A major drought or systems failure leading to a total breakdown of national water supplies and / or sewage services lasting three months or more. 
[FYI longest drought in UK history was in London 1893 for 73 days while the impact of 1988 Camelford Water pollution accidents continues to rumble on 34 years later]

businessImpact.name: High
businessImpact.description: A water shortage of systems failure leading to a breakdown of regional water supplies and/or sewage services impacting more than 100 people for up to 3 months

businessImpact.name: Medium
businessImpact.description: A shortage of water caused by drought to an incident leading to a breakdown of local water supplies and / or sewage services for over 100 people which lasts up to 1 month.

businessImpact.name: Low
businessImpact.description: A prolonged drought or serious incident resulting in a breakdown of local water supplies and/or sewage services for up to about 100 people for up to 1 month

businessImpact.name: Very Low
businessImpact.description: An event which causes a breakdown of local water supplies and / or sewage services for a small number (<50) of people for more than a week.

businessImpact.name: High
